anya-e0501n20:1_0: Sattavidho atthipaccayo, sahajātatthipaccayo vatthupure jātatthi paccayo ārammaṇapurejātatthipaccayo
anya-e0501n20:2: Tattha sahajātapaccayo eva sahajātatthipaccayo nāma. Esa nayo sesesu chasu. Paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgopi heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttoyeva.
anya-e0501n20:3: Kenaṭṭhena atthipaccayo. Sayaṁ khaṇikapaccuppannatā saṅkhātena atthibhāvena paccuppannassa dhammassa paccayo atthipaccayo. Atthipaccayadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
